quotes.introduction: We are not just growing food; we are growing relationships—with the soil, with the seed, with the seasons, with each other. The garden teaches us that abundance flows not from extraction, but from reciprocity.
quotes.vision: By year 11, envision Earth's food systems as a living network of Kinship Gardens—bioregional zones where Indigenous knowledge guides agricultural practices, where soil health indices replace profit margins as success metrics.
quotes.transformation: The age of industrial extraction is ending. The era of regenerative abundance begins now.
